text: A te, kotoryye zhili v dome (Medine) i obreli veru do nikh, lyubyat pereselivshikhsya k nim i ne oshchushchayut nikakoy nuzhdy k tomu, chto darovano im. Oni otdayut im predpochteniye pered soboy, dazhe yesli oni sami nuzhdayutsya. A te, kto uberegsya ot sobstvennoy skuposti, yavlyayutsya preuspevshimi
